roleset.name: be on all sides of, encompassing
roleset.note: SURROUND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'surround' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes contiguous_location-47.8 fill-9.8, other framed members include contain, dominate, top. Comparison to contain. (from surround.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The fact that a vast majority of fundamentalist money managers fail to beat the S& P 500 may contribute to the hysteria surrounding the issue.

example.name: with causative agent
example.text: John surrounded the castle with his toy soldiers.
